resourceDescription.description: This method allows to configure both the LAN IPv4 Address and the DHCP server pool

inputList.inputDescription: The object name of the service that will be used when trying to sets the configuration of the DHCP server.

output.outputDescription:
Composed of the following parameters:
- status: see Return Status
- data: returned object, if successful

Returned object contains the LAN IPv4 Address and the DHCP server pool
